thread.title: John Goodman steps out looking noticeably thinner
thread.title_full: John Goodman steps out looking noticeably thinner - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: John Goodman steps out looking noticeably thinner
text:
Image 1 of / 1 1
John Goodman attends the Accenture Gala Screening of 'Trumbo' during the BFI London Film Festival at Odeon Leicester Square on October 8, 2015 in London, England. (Photo by )
John Goodman attends the Accenture Gala Screening of 'Trumbo'...
John Goodman steps out looking noticeably thinner 1 / 1 Back to Gallery It's no secret that one of John Goodman's more noticeable features was his size.
And now it's the lack thereof.
Goodman revealed his dramatic weight loss this week when he stepped out on the red carpet during the "Trumbo" movie premiere in London last night.
He once told David Letterman he was pushing 400 pounds at one point and that staying in shape was an ongoing battle.
"I'm not going to look like Paris Hilton or anything like that. It's going to be an ongoing process for the rest of my life," Goodman told Letterman .
Kudos to you, John.
